text: Xo phu sraththa thanghlay! Cng xya di yud xea pheux snith thi ruhen kickar phaynı xun cak phwk khxng cea xeng sung khea hela nan ca mi ld lba kæ phwk cea nı kar kx khwam seiyhay hı keid khun phwk khea chxb ksr thi phwk cea labak thæcring khwam keliyd chang tang«di pheyx xk ma læw cak pak khxng phwk khea læa sing thi hawxk khxng phsk khea sxn wi nan hıy ying kwa nænxn rea di cækcæng brrda xongkar wi kæ phwk cea læw hak phwk cea chı payya kan
